description: Pulled from the archives and updated with modern tech fabrics, the ‘87 PolarPlus Alpinist Fleece Jacket is built for adventure. Or just sitting around and hanging out. Basically…this fleece is up for whatever and down for anything. Built with a comfy Seawool™ fleece fabric, the jacket has a soft velour-like feel on the inside while high-wear areas are reinforced on the outside with recycled nylon overlays for added durability. Throw it over a tech-tee for a cold morning run or pull it over a hoody for a late-night dogwalk. Zippered pockets and an elastic hem keep it simple so you can keep it moving or aren't moving at all.
name: Marmot 87 PolarPlus Alpinist Fleece Jacket - Unisex
